name: Table Manners: Worm-Cation
description:
Old Hope Island is under siege from the giant worms! It's up to you to help Leighton find a way to save the island before Richard obliterates it with a nuclear missile! Fortunately, Taylor will be there to order...we mean guide you through so that Old Hope Island can return to being a vacation paradise! With dozens of side quests and a fun story, all combined with retro art, music,, and sounds, you're in for hours of fun! Now let's get to the island!

Controls
Movement: Directional Keys
Action: Z/A

Throw: X/B

Start: Enter/Start

Select: Shift/Select
